parameters.prompt: synthwave, melancholy, nostalgic, electric piano, glitchy beats, cinematic
parameters.lyrics: [verse] Neon signs flicker low / Like all the dreams we used to know / Static hums on the radio / Playing songs from long ago [chorus] We were infinite, we were bright / Like constellations in the night / Now we’re just echoes in the sky / Fading out with passing time [verse] Your voice still lingers in the air / A ghost I catch when I’m not there / But every call goes nowhere / Just silence on the wire [chorus] We were infinite, we were bright / Like constellations in the night / Now we’re just echoes in the sky / Fading out with passing time [bridge] Maybe in another life / We’ll find our way back to the light / Until then, I’ll whisper to the stars / Hoping they remember who we are [outro] Neon signs flicker low / Like all the dreams we used to know
